alert.note: Alert for Crockett (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 04 at 11:06PM CDT until October 04 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CROCKETT COUNTY... At 1106 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of The Intersection Of Ranch Road 2083 And Highway 405, or 11 miles north of Pandale, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... The Intersection Of Ranch Road 2083 And Highway 405 and The Intersection Of Highway 163 And Ranch Road 1973. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
